name: doss
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to sleep outside or in an empty building because you have no home and no money: She was dossing in doorways until the police picked her up. See also
dosshouse UK slang
(also doss down) to sleep somewhere without a bed: Can I doss down at your house tonight, after the party?

The first job I ever had was a complete doss.
